StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_UpdateCandidateSSA]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Marine_Candidate int, @ARN varchar(9), @SSA_Status int, @SSA_Discrepancy int, @UserLogin varchar(15) AS
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CANDIDATE_SSA_STATUS WHERE MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @Marine_Candidate) BEGIN UPDATE CANDIDATE_SSA_STATUS SET SSA_STATUS = @SSA_Status, SSA_DISCREPANCY = @SSA_Discrepancy, USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @Marine_Candidate END ELSE BEGIN --- INSERT THE Alien Registra.on Data INSERT INTO CANDIDATE_SSA_STATUS (MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID, SSA_STATUS, SSA_DISCREPANCY, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (@Marine_Candidate, @SSA_Status, @SSA_Discrepancy, @UserLogin, GETDATE()) END
